job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
Overview
Come join the "
IIS Infrastructure Security Team
" as a "
Software Engineer 2
". The Software Engineer 2 role is to employ a set of tools, automation activities and processes to ensure that sensitive data is not lost, misused, or accessed by unauthorized users.
What You'll Bring
BS/MS in computer science or equivalent work experience.
Experience in security controls (Data Loss Prevention, Cloud Access Security Broker, URL filtering)
2+ years experience developing web, software, or mobile applications.
Solid grasp of software engineering fundamentals and their practical application.
Experience with the following: LanDesk, JAMF, Python, Github, Ansible & Cloud Formation templates
Experience with the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).
1+ years experience with web services (consuming or creating) with REST or SOAP.
Strong experience with any of the following: Python, Java/J2EE, AWS CloudFormation or Ansible.
Strong desire to learn and grow.
Excellent problem solving skills with a history of superb delivery against assigned tasks.
Solid communication skills: Demonstrated ability to explain complex technical issues to both technical and non-technical audiences.
Outstanding partnership skills.
How You Will Lead
Architecting, developing, deploying and automating SaaS and agent based security solutions
Evaluating vendor security solutions and conducting proof of concepts (POC’s)
Roughly 40% hands-on coding
Contribute to early quality activities, including peer reviews of estimates, designs and code
Resolve defects/bugs during QA testing, pre-production, production, and post-release patches
Partner effectively with all team members to deliver against commitments
Work cross-functionally with various Intuit teams: product management, program management, dev-operations, various product lines, or business units to drive forward results
Partner effectively with our security vendors, driving issue resolution and roadmap capabilities
Commitment to team success and positive team dynamics
Passion for growing and applying technical skills in service to customers
Experience with Agile Development, SCRUM, and/or Extreme Programming methodologies
